overview: Welcome to the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE). The Department of CSE focused on Research and Development in the pioneer areas of CSE. The aim is to prepare its students for professional employment, entrepreneurship,  and higher education through study and implementation of the fundamental principles of software design, hardware architecture design, computer security, and novel application developments
overview2: Welcome to the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE). The students are able to demonstrate the concept of different Programming/Scripting Languages (Python, JAVA, C, C++, MATLAB, R, etc.), Internet of Things (IoT), Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Cyber Security, Digital Forensics, Digital Image Processing, Computer Architecture, Microprocessors and Embedded systems,  etc., under the mentorship of MANIT Bhopal. The well-established laboratories of MANIT Bhopal are shared with the students of IIIT Bhopal for their overall development. Additionally, IIIT Bhopal owns Computer Laboratory, Internet of  Things (IoT) Laboratory under the umbrella of MANIT Bhopal.
overview3: For more info checkout here : https://iiitbhopal.ac.in/#!/M0009/SM0046/
